sources.title: THE GIANT OF METROPOLIS (1961)
sources.description: A very imaginative Scifi sword and sandales movie by Umberto Scarpelli starring Gordon Mitchel in maybe his best film shot in Cine Citta. more info on http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0054924/

sources.title: MonsterpieceTheaterPresents09
sources.description: Sword and sandal meets science fiction in Giant Of Metropolis

metadata.Plot: Muscleman Ohro travels to the sinful capital of Atlantis to rebuke its godlessness and hubris and becomes involved in the battle against its evil lord Yoh-tar and his hideous super-science schemes.
metadata.Writer: Sabatino Ciuffini, Ambrogio Molteni, Oreste Palella
metadata.Actors: Gordon Mitchell, Bella Cortez, Roldano Lupi
